Title: Cast
Victor Frankenstein: James McAvoy, Daniel Radcliffe, Jessica Brown Findlay

Title: Synopsis
Victor Frankenstein:
Told from Igor's perspective, we see the troubled 
	young assistant's dark origins, his redemptive friendship 
	with the young medical student Viktor Von Frankenstein, 
	and become eyewitnesses to the emergence of how Frankenstein
	 became the man - and the legend - we know today.
